num_processing_threads.description: Number of threads for processing grid map cells. Filtering of the raw input point cloud is not parallelized

min_num_points_per_cell.description: Minimum number of points in the point cloud that have to fall within any of the grid map cells. Otherwise the cell elevation will be set to NaN

resolution.description: Resolution of the grid map. Width and length are computed automatically

height_type.description: Resolution of the grid map. Width and length are computed automatically.

height_thresh.description: Height range from the smallest cluster (Only for height_type 1)
